title: Submit application
description: We begin by conducting a thorough assessment of your products and requirements.
details: Submit the application with required documents to BIS online and hardcopy to FMCD department
BIS authority will verify the application

title: Query raised (if any)
description: We help you prepare and organize all necessary documentation for the certification process.
details: In case, any document or test equipment or any other requirement is missing or incomplete, communication will be done by email with applicant
If the application is found satisfactory in all respects, it will be recorded
Acknowledgement number will be allotted for future purpose

title: Audit/Inspection
description: We coordinate the testing of your products with accredited laboratories.
details: BIS Officer will arrange a visit at factory premises of applicant on the mutually agreed date
BIS Officer will verify the manufacturing process, testing infrastructure and also test the product in your in-house laboratory
BIS Officer will collect the sample, seal it, and forward it for testing with an independent laboratory

title: Sample Testing
description: We assist in preparing for and managing the factory inspection process.
details: Sample collected sent to BIS Approval Laboratory
Charges for testing will be paid by the application firm

title: Grant of License
description: We guide you through the final stages of certification and ongoing compliance.
details: Satisfactory inspection report of the auditor visited the factory premises, and test report of the product received according to Indian Standards
Applicant should pay a Licence fee, advance minimum Marking fee & if any outstanding due
Letter for Grant of Licence issued
